string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets5
I received permission to go all the way to #m270020500#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270020500##k and defeat the Ice Knight, #r#o8220005##k. \n\n#o8220005# #r#a35121##k
I defeated #o8220005#. #p2140000# granted me permission. I should be able to go past the Road of Regrets now.
If you want to go in further, you'll need to take a harder test... Makes perfect sense, no? So what do you want? Do you want the new test?
Then go to #b#m270020500##k and defeat #r#o8220005##k, the Ice Knight who guards the Road of Regrets. If you defeat the Ice Knight, I will grant you permission to go beyond that.
That's too hard for you? That's too bad then. I guess that's just your limit.
You've defeated #o8220005#. That's amazing. I will grant you the permission as promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to go past #m270030000#, the Door of Oblivion, and look back at your 1st oblivion#k.
Go on. You should be able to go up till #b#m270030100##k. As you may have guessed, you can't go beyond that. If you want to go further... you'll have to take a another test.
You haven't defeated #r#o8220005##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
